room_title: Escape room "999 Strange Place" by Enter the Room in Colorado Springs
review: This was a first escape room for us, but we were paired with another group of four experienced players. They said this was the best escape room they've seen all around the country!it was so much fun! There was one crazy surprise after another. The room is also completely original. Absolute genius and unique work!

room_title: Escape room "999 Strange Place" by Enter the Room in Colorado Springs
review: This was the coolest thing ever! We did the 999 Strange Place and it was so much fun. They work hard to put these rooms together and it is definitely worth going. Really challenges the mind in a very exciting way.
